pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people would have played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the Foundation's parks, accumulations occur again and again that do not comply with the distance and hygiene rules of the COVID-19 Handling Ordinance.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with about 300 people in the Park Babelsberg, a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a corona ordinance, the parks are closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: Camping on the meadows is prohibited according to park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for a long time that visitors are leaving more and more rubbish behind and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have taken on a different dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party in Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was broken up by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still outstanding in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: Accordingly, many of those infected are young interns in tourism businesses, but at least one holiday guest also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodations on Saturday night.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 23 o'clock.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: " There are cancellations and cancellations there and there " of bookings, said the head of the Wolfgangsee tourism association, Hans Wieser, to the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around a third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday, the first infections became public knowledge.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended on Saturday the behavior of the interns, who had celebrated in several restaurants and could have been infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: " We all liked doing that in our youth, " he told the radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism board launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees of the dangers of COVID-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: Starting on Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from July 15 were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak evokes memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a center of the spread of COVID-19 throughout Europe in the early stages of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of new infections is on Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - The English football record champions Manchester United are returning to the Champions League after a year of absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the league on the last day of the Premier League thanks to a 2: 0 (0: 0) success against their direct rival Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes must now be content with the Europa League, because FC Chelsea still passed by and also qualified for the premier class in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against the descent, Aston Villa was allowed to cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90th + 8) scored to the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, FC Bayern's opponent in the Champions League round of 16, won thanks to Mason Mount (45th + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45th + 4) in parallel with 2: 0 (2: 0) against the Wolverhampton Wanderers.
wn.de.700458.9: " That means a lot to me, " said coach Frank Lampard, who in his first season as Chelsea coach is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.10: Tottenham Hotspur also profited from Chelsea's win against Wolverhampton, who still passed the Wolves with a meagre 1: 1 (1: 0) at Crystal Palace and started sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa decided the long-distance duel with Watford FC and Bournemouth AFC for itself, but had to tremble for a long time for the league title at West Ham United.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) was immediately compensated by Andrej Yarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which lost three coaches in the season, is relegated after five first-league years.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which could no longer save itself through a 3: 1 (2: 1) at FC Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: FC Liverpool, who have been confirmed as English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3: 1 (1: 1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points are the highest score the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017 / 18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned Sunday's game for Liverpool.
wn.de.700458.22: " It was an extraordinary season for this wonderful club, " said goalscorer van Dijk after the game, " that should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses should also be satisfied in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Because of the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were interrupted from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, it was even discussed about a premature termination or a holding of the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: Eventually, however, the season could be played to the end without any special occurrences - however, as in Germany, without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming ever fiercer.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night there have been violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police took violent action in Jerusalem on Sunday night against participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Binyamin Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, said police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to disperse the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the COVID-19 crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns, and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu have also been arrested, reported the news site " ynet. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to the police, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv because he is suspected of having sprayed pepper spray from a moving car on demonstrators on the roadside.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a stabbing attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: In Jerusalem and Tel Aviv there have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the COVID-19 crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: He is accused, among other things, of hasty easing and a lack of preparation for a second wave of COVID-19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The COVID-19 crisis has hit the country's economy hard.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate recently stood at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel has recently risen to ever new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Transporter crashes on car - nine injured - Ruhrgebiet - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision demanded nine minor injuries on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen.
bild.254850.3: A female driver was travelling with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: " Presumably she had suddenly braked because she wanted to turn. "
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van, who was driving behind her, must have seen that too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: In the accident, three occupants in the car and six in the van were slightly injured.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after suspected corona case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: So far, North Korea has seen its own measures to ward off the coronavirus as a " shining success. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: The country is now reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official suspected case of corona in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a large city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defenses in the past six months, " the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country, " state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: The state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The Communist leadership proclaimed the highest level of alarm.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: Should the suspected case be confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: According to its own statements, North Korea had not yet registered a single infection and described its defensive measures as a " shining success. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The disease symptoms were reportedly found in an " outlier " who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person fled to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: For the border crossing within the four-kilometre-wide and for the most part still mined military buffer zone, there was initially no confirmation from South Korea.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea's military acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing to North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were underway on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: According to its own statements, North Korea convened an emergency meeting of the Workers' Party Politburo chaired by leader Kim Jong Un on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The " dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive disaster. "
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday as a preventive measure to " completely block Kaesong and isolate every district and the region from others, " it continued.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The affected person, as well as all people in Kaesong who had been in contact with her, were put under quarantine.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The party's central military commission should therefore investigate the " runaway case " as well as the conduct of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: According to estimates, around 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension before Council meeting: City East and noise protection are still up for discussion before big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: " In addition to environmental topics, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the large-scale project Innenstadtentwicklung-Ost, " it says rather casually in the middle section of the city's press release on the next city council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4.30 pm in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all, the upgrading of the eastern city is controversially discussed right up to the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are scarce, most recently even negative in individual committees depending on attendance.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from industry (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed out of the citizens and then by the administration and the municipal council fail after almost ten years of preparation, criticized project opponent Reinhard Klein as an " extra-parliamentary opposition, " " clueless, " " speculation, " " defamation " and " deliberate false statements. "
pz-news.de.72354.6: " Everyone thinks they know better, " says Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the citizens' list in Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the treaties, he was in this position: " I know what I'm talking about. "
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit is said to be cheaper for the city, and contrary to statements by the city administration, the Technical Town Hall is looking for grants, the existence of which Klein is convinced will cost 8.5 million euros to renovate.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop quite differently from what is predicted in the town hall and on the part of business advocates.
pz-news.de.72354.10: Shaping the city through its own strength and not an investor: This is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP / FW / UB / LED parliamentary group, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: Essentially, it also envisages the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, keeping the Schloßberg open, renting the Ex-Thales for administrative areas and a smaller-scale inner-city redesign, ideally with local sponsors.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues in particular will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the local council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from health-related noise pollution caused by road traffic, many of which include speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local Verkehrsclub Deutschland welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, those politically responsible in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen, because they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise through the neglect of regular bus services with thinned-out cycles and through little commitment to bicycle traffic, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the city's participation in the energy and climate protection agency Pforzheim / Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: The agenda also includes accession to the Climate Protection Pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the redetermination of parental contributions in municipal day-care centres and the application for inclusion in the federal government's smart city funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed COVID-19 protections.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: With a delay of almost half a year, Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operation, the first test drives were now on the agenda.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: The corona crisis has long prevented Tim Zimmermann from tackling his first business trip in Grasser Racing's new Lamborghini Huracan.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: Under special hygienic conditions, this was now possible.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old from Langenargen completed his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: " There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season, " says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: " With the ABS, for example, you have to go into the corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun. "
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite being only 25 years old, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and was able to help his new team-mate in many ways.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: " I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series also brings new challenges, " says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: " Steijn and I understand each other brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring. "
schwaebische.de.113555.15: Exactly there - at the Lausitzring - the GT Masters will also be holding its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From July 31, the 33 super sports cars will race through Lausitz.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 serial newcomers, knows the track though.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015 he was most recently a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: " It worked quickly and I didn't have much to get used to the track, " says Zimmermann, who is starting for the Graf Zeppelin racing team from Friedrichshafen.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: " The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally to be fast. "
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is will be revealed in two weeks' time.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: " The teams naturally play poker a little during the tests, " he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: " Ultimately, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring. "
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a tightly packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current situation is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: Ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will grab the GT steering wheel at the Nürburgring in mid-August.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British transport minister caught off guard by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The decision of the British government to put Spain vacationers under quarantine for two weeks after their return has, according to press reports, caught the country's transport minister off guard.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Accordingly, Grant Shapps is currently on holiday in Spain of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to rising corona numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry is possible without quarantine requirements.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation applies from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to be quarantined after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the rule applies to those who are just on holiday on the cut-off date, only from Saturday, August 1, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is still regarded in Austria as one of the " safe countries " for which no quarantine in Austria is required.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: " Many ministers may have known in advance that there is a possibility that a quarantine will be imposed on holiday-makers in Spain, " commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: " But apparently no one bothered to let Grant Shapp know. "
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the COVID-19 emergency in Spain and the expiry of the strict curfew, infections in the country are rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists mainly blame the nightlife for the recent spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of Britain's favourite holiday destinations.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government currently advises against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, with the exception of the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced plans to equip warships with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons to mark Navy Day in his country.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, which are unique in the world, would expand the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defence also provided information on successful tests of the Zirkon hypersonic rocket built for the navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 metres per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Unterwassertropedeo will continue to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will also continue on the atomically equipped underwater torpedo Poseidon, it was said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also sailed a military boat, said that 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet units of the largest country in the world this year alone.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: The navy has been reliably protecting Russia for 300 years, Putin said on the day celebrated by sailors across the country.
mz-web.de.376126.13: The naval forces also celebrated Marine Day with parades in many other Russian coastal towns.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at a weapons show in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video published by the Ministry of Defence showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane " Hanna " reaches Texas: Aid made more difficult due to corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has hit land in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rainfall are now threatening parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center of the US climate agency NOAA announced on Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for numerous districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The COVID-19 pandemic raging in Texas is making the work of aid workers more difficult, Abbott continued, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: " Every hurricane is a huge challenge, " Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle newspaper.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the Texas cyclone, he added, " This challenge is complicated and exacerbated when you consider it sweeping through an area that is the state's most COVID-19-affected area. "
tt.com.149061.9: According to the Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to exercise caution.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices " to which we have become accustomed, " such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It is important that everyone keeps their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms have also been made available in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, tests for corona are to be carried out in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage had initially only been reported from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, " Hanna " was hit by land on the island of Padre Island just off the Texas coast, according to information from the authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the stretch of coast from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was first issued and later taken back.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown, while " Hanna " moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane " Douglas " was on its way to Hawaii in the night to Sunday with wind speeds of around 150 kilometres per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: The Hurricane Center, however, expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it will be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: According to a forecast from May, NOAA expected an above-average active hurricane season over the Atlantic this year.
tt.com.149061.26: Up to ten hurricanes are to be expected from June to the end of November, of which up to six could be very strong cyclones, the authorities had explained.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, that of a below-average even only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: Video assistant " punished " Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic lost two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals denied: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening at the 0: 2 (0: 1) at SSC Naples in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the referee's video assistant.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: " A festival of non-given goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR acted so hard against a team, " commented the " Corriere dello Sport. "
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Napoli had gone into the lead through a goal from full-back Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, while Filip Djuricic cheered the equalizer in the 32nd minute.

salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise to award the World Championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: However, all America races were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Racing calendar is becoming ever more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far, three more race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, there will be races at the Nürburgring in Germany and in Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for championship points on the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: As things stand at present, the 2020 racing calendar thus comprises 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: " We are pleased to continue to make great strides in completing our plans for the 2020 season, " said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: In total, 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to close its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could still take place at the end of November before the already officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations call for races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the regulations of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the awarding of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, it is only driven on two continents, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles citing " exceptional circumstances " due to the corona virus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start to the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming COVID-19 crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent later this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be a guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation meets with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: " We look forward to being with them again next season, " Carey explained.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races met with criticism above all in Brazil: " The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for this, " said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, infections in the São Paulo area are significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: The concerns of some teams not wanting to drive in Brazil would also not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: One is prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil look against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg war in der <unk> Latenacht-Show von Stephen Colbert per Videoschalte zu Gast und <unk> im Interview, was sie bei <unk> mit Donald Trump im <unk> hat.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Klimaatkivistin Greta Thunberg war per Videoschalte zu Gast in <unk> US-Latenacht-Show.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her fight against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous " evil eye " during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - In the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has drawn attention to herself with her tireless commitment to the " Fridays For Future " movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known late-night show about her plans for the future as well as her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight presenter Stephen Colbert greeted the 17-year-old Thunberg on Tuesday in your show and conducted a longer interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: " There are some things that surprised me, " she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: " How far people are going to steer the focus away from the climate crisis, " she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: " Everything from organised hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children are taking to the streets, " she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and leading politicians who scoff at her on social media or even try to silence her find her " funny " because the reactions show her " because they have no other answer. "
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview, when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitterly evil look after US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the UN Climate Summit 2019 in New York, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was captured by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip resulted in a GIF, an animated image that ultimately became one of the most commonly used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To the relatively open question posed by Stephen Colbert, she answered only briefly and dryly: " To be honest, I think that needs no further explanation. "
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not reckoned with the quick-witted answer and briefly disappeared laughing from the picture.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her " How dare you? " speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.

mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly uphill again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drug junkie, cult fan: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, informed family members on Saturday in an official statement, a further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians like Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a " monumental loss " for all past and present members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: The drummer Fleetwood and the guitarist Green had founded the now long-legendary band in London in 1967, his dreamy instrumental hit " Albatross " remains unforgotten to this day.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life (" The End Of The Game, " " In The Skies ") resembled a rollercoaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a rapid rise - the band celebrated their greatest successes but then without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: There is said to have been a dispute, among other things, because Green wanted to donate all of the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Already three years after the foundation Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have temporarily lived on the street, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working-class family in the London borough of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: Already at a young age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned his first guitar chords.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began to play the guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to stand on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later he was engaged as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton at the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song " Albatross, " composed by Green, brought the group their first number one hit in the winter of 1968 / 69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: " The worst thing that happened to me in life are the drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit. "
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved a respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac meanwhile swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album " Rumours " sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he went new to the start in 1996 with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British " Daily Telegraph " spoke at the time of a rock star who had returned to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band disbanded in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his gentle sound, one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
